pages.title: Solid Access Port
pages.text: The Solid Access Port converts solid materials (usually ingots) into fuel reactants that will fill your $(l:bigreactors:reactor/part-fuelrod)Fuel Rods$(/l) and power your Reactor.$(br2)In the graphical interface you can set the Port mode: in $(bold)inlet mode$() the Port will accept fuel source materials, in $(bold)outlet mode$() it will output waste.

A $(l:bigreactors:misc/wrench)wrench$(/l) can be used to change the Port mode.$(br2)The graphical interface can also be used to insert and extract materials manually.$(br2)The Solid Access Port is a quick solution to add fuel to your Reactor but, like every quick solution ever, it is not perfect and a small material loss is unavoidable.

$(l)Mandatory:$() no, but you will need a couple anyway$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() all$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() yes$(br)$(l)Wrench:$() a $(l:bigreactors:misc/wrench)wrench$(/l) can be used to toggle the Port mode.
